txt.en: A pressure plate locks into place
A pressure plate locks into place
A pressure plate locks into place
A pressure plate locks into place
A pressure plate locks into place
The Jewel of Masal can be found in the Pit of Stonejaws.\n\nYou should collect the Jewel of Masal.
The final pressure plate locks into place and the jewel is revealed!

The second location can be found in the Pit of Stonejaws.

You should stand at the second location.

'I bear the symbol of your line and kept you safe during the war.'

The third location can be found in the Pit of Stonejaws.

You should stand at the third location.

'As chance would have it, I have broken the lines and turned the tides of battle.'

The fourth location can be found in the Pit of Stonejaws.

You should stand at the fourth location.

'As chance would have it, I have both pierced the skin of the enemy, and sliced an apple for a meal.'

The fifth location can be found in the Pit of Stonejaws.

You should stand at the fifth location.

'I was there when the first tree fell to build your home.'

The sixth location can be found in the Pit of Stonejaws.

You should stand at the sixth location.

'I was there when you struck the nails that would hold your home together.'

'You have my thanks for retrieving the Jewel of Masal, which lay hidden behind riddles no others were able to solve!\n\n'This light-blue jewel symbolizes the good fortune of the dwarves and of all those who seek prosperity in Gundabad. But it reminds us too that chance can be fleeting, and we must appreciate that which we have when we have it. Let the return of the Jewel of Masal prove that the luck we need to see the Mountain-home reclaimed is of our own making, the result of our own hard work.'

The seventh location can be found in the Pit of Stonejaws.

You should stand at the seventh location.

'I have found all that remains just out of your grounded grasp.'
A pressure plate locks into place
Added the Jewel of Masal to the Throne of Zidir-nesad
Rísti Graver can be found at the Steepset in Máttugard.\n\nYou should talk to Rísti Graver.

Feeling the small indentation in the Plaque of Masal, you discover that it is a very small pressure plate. Pressing down on the indentation reveals seven lines of text upon the plaque. These words must show the way to the jewel's location....

'As you were walking, you got to where you needed to go with me by your side.

'I bear the symbol of your line and kept you safe during the war.

'As chance would have it, I have broken the lines and turned the tides of battle.

'As chance would have it, I have both pierced the skin of the enemy, and sliced an apple for a meal.

'I was there when the first tree fell to build your home.

'I was there when you struck the nails that would hold your home together.

'I have found all that remains just out of your grounded grasp.'
The Throne of Zidir-nesad can be found at the Steepset in Máttugard.\n\nYou should add the Jewel of Masal to the Throne of Zidir-nesad under Rísti Graver's supervision.

The first location can be found in the Pit of Stonejaws.

You should stand at the first location.

'As you were walking, you got to where you needed to go with me by your side.'
Add the Jewel of Masal to the Throne of Zidir-nesad
